AT.name: Adventure Time: Das Geheimnis des Namenlosen Königreichs
AT.description: Wie spät ist es? Es ist Zeit, mit Finn (dem Menschen) und seinem besten Kumpel Jake (dem gestaltwandlerischen Hund) in ein vollkommen neues Abenteuer im mysteriösen namenlosen Königreich zu ziehen. Stürze dich ins Abenteuer, löse kniffelige Rätsel und enthülle versteckte Geheimnisse in einem neuen Königreich, das exklusiv für das Computerspiel geschaffen wurde. • Spiele als Finn und lass dich von seinem Kumpel jake unterstützen! • Ein klassisches Action-Adventure! • Bereise das wilde und unerforschte namenlose Königreich, triff brandneue Prinzessinnen, Charaktere und Gegner, während du dich durch einzigartige Tempel und eine Oberwelt voller Gefahren kämpfst! • Lerne und verbessere auf deinen Reisen neue Fähigkeiten und Waffentechniken und sammle allen möglichen Kram! • Entdecke versteckte Geheimnisse, löse anspruchsvolle Rätsel und erledige wahnwitzige Aufgaben! • Triff neue und alte Bekannte, zum Beispiel Eiskönig, Günter, Marceline, die Beulenweltprinzessin, Flambo, Zaubermann, BMO und mehr!

AU.name: Adventure Time: The Secret of the Nameless Kingdom
AU.description: What time is it? It’s time to join Finn (the human) and his best bro Jake (the shape shifting dog) on an original heroic adventure through the mysterious Nameless Kingdom. Go on epic quests, solve challenging puzzles and uncover hidden secrets by exploring a new realm created exclusively for the video game. • Play as Finn with help from his homie Jake! • An original top-down action adventure! • Explore the wild and uncharted Nameless Kingdom, encounter brand new princesses, characters and foes as you battle your way through unique temples and an overworld filled with danger! • Unlock and upgrade abilities and weapon techniques while exploring and collecting all kinds of stuff! • Discover hidden secrets, solve challenging puzzles and complete hilarious quests! • Encounter new and fan favorite characters including Ice King, Gunter, Marceline, Lumpy Space Princess, Flambo, Magic Man, BMO and more!

BG.name: Adventure Time: The Secret of the Nameless Kingdom
BG.description: What time is it? It’s time to join Finn (the human) and his best bro Jake (the shape shifting dog) on an original heroic adventure through the mysterious Nameless Kingdom. Go on epic quests, solve challenging puzzles and uncover hidden secrets by exploring a new realm created exclusively for the video game. • Play as Finn with help from his homie Jake! • An original top-down action adventure! • Explore the wild and uncharted Nameless Kingdom, encounter brand new princesses, characters and foes as you battle your way through unique temples and an overworld filled with danger! • Unlock and upgrade abilities and weapon techniques while exploring and collecting all kinds of stuff! • Discover hidden secrets, solve challenging puzzles and complete hilarious quests! • Encounter new and fan favorite characters including Ice King, Gunter, Marceline, Lumpy Space Princess, Flambo, Magic Man, BMO and more!

BE.name: Adventure Time : Le secret du royaume sans nom
BE.description: Quelle heure est-il ? C'est l'heure d'accompagner Finn (l'humain) et son meilleur pote Jake (le chien métamorphe) dans une aventure héroïque originale pour percer les mystères du Royaume sans nom. Entreprenez des quêtes épiques, résolvez des casse-tête relevés et découvrez des secrets cachés en explorant un nouveau royaume créé exclusivement pour le jeu vidéo. • Incarnez Finn, aidé de son fidèle compagnon Jake ! • Un jeu d'action-aventure original en vue de dessus ! • Parcourez le sauvage et inexploré Royaume sans nom, rencontrez de nouveaux personnages, princesses et ennemis à mesure que vous progressez dans des temples à nul autre pareils et dans un monde aux multiples dangers ! • Déverrouillez et améliorez des capacités et techniques de combat tout en explorant et ramassant toutes sortes de choses ! • Dénichez des secrets, résolvez des casse-tête ardus et terminez des quêtes hilarantes ! • Rencontrez vos personnages favoris ainsi que de nouveaux, comme le Roi des glaces, Gunter, Marceline, Princesse Lumpy Space, Flambo, le Magicien, BMO et bien d'autres !

ES.name: Hora de Aventuras: El Secreto del Reino Sin Nombre
ES.description: ¿Qué hora es? Es hora de juntarte con Finn (el humano) y su compi del alma Jake (el perro transformista) para iniciar una aventura singular y heroica a lo largo del misterioso Reino sin nombre. Emprende épicas misiones, resuelve rompecabezas que son todo un reto y descubre secretos ocultos al explorar este nuevo reino creado exclusivamente para el videojuego. • ¡Juega como Finn ayudado por su colega Jake! • ¡Una original aventura a vista de pájaro! • Explora el Reino sin nombre, un lugar salvaje que no aparece en el mapa; ¡conoce a princesas, personajes y enemigos totalmente nuevos mientras te abres camino pelea a pelea por templos únicos y un mundo exterior lleno de peligros! • Desbloquea habilidades y técnicas de armas ¡y mejóralas mientras exploras y recoges toda clase de cachivaches! • Descubre secretos ocultos, resuelve rompecabezas que son todo un reto ¡y completa misiones desternillantes! • Encuéntrate con personajes nuevos y con algunos favoritos de los fans, como el Rey Hielo, Gunter, Marceline, la Princesa del Espacio Bultos, Flambo, el Hombre Mágico, Bemo ¡y muchos más!

IT.name: Adventure Time: Il segreto del Regno Senzanome
IT.description: Che ora è? È l'ora di accompagnare Finn (l'umano) e il suo migliore amico Jake (il cane, in grado di cambiare forma) in un'originale avventura eroica attraverso i misteri del Regno Anonimo. Affronta missioni epiche, risolvi complicati enigmi e scopri i segreti nascosti esplorando un nuovo regno creato in esclusiva per il videogioco. • Gioca nei panni di Finn con l'aiuto del fedele Jake! • Un'originale avventura carica d'azione con visuale dall'alto! • Esplora il selvaggio e inesplorato Regno Anonimo, incontra nuovi personaggi, principesse e nemici, mentre combatti attraverso templi incredibili e un mondo sotterraneo pieno di pericoli! • Sblocca e migliora le abilità e le armi, mentre giochi e raccogli tantissimi oggetti! • Scopri segreti misteriosi, risolvi entusiasmanti enigmi e completa delle missioni spassosissime! • Conosci sia i personaggi nuovi che quelli tanto amati dai fan, come Re Ghiaccio, Gunter, Marceline, la Principessa dello Spazio Bitorzolo, Flambo, l'Omino magico, BMO e tanti altri!

PT.name: Adventure Time: The Secret of the Nameless Kingdom
PT.description: Que horas são? São horas de te juntares ao Finn (o humano) e ao seu melhor amigo Jake (o cão que muda de forma) numa aventura original e heroica no misterioso Reino Sem Nome. Parte em missões épicas, resolve puzzles complexos e descobre segredos ocultos explorando um novo reino criado exclusivamente para o videojogo. • Joga como Finn e ajuda o seu amigo Jake! • Uma aventura original de ação vertical! • Explora o selvagem e desconhecido Reino Sem Nome, conhece novas princesas, personagens e inimigos ao combateres em templos sem igual e num mundo aéreo cheio de perigos! • Desbloqueia e melhora capacidades e técnicas de utilização de armas enquanto exploras e colecionas todo o tipo de coisas! • Descobre segredos bem escondidos, resolve puzzles complexos e cumpre missões hilariantes! • Encontra novas personagens e algumas favoritas dos fãs, tais como Ice King, Gunter, Marceline, Lumpy Space Princess, Flambo, Magic Man, BMO e muitos mais!

SK.name: Adventure Time: The Secret of the Nameless Kingdom
SK.description: What time is it? It’s time to join Finn (the human) and his best bro Jake (the shape shifting dog) on an original heroic adventure through the mysterious Nameless Kingdom. Go on epic quests, solve challenging puzzles and uncover hidden secrets by exploring a new realm created exclusively for the video game. • Play as Finn with help from his homie Jake! • An original top-down action adventure! • Explore the wild and uncharted Nameless Kingdom, encounter brand new princesses, characters and foes as you battle your way through unique temples and an overworld filled with danger! • Unlock and upgrade abilities and weapon techniques while exploring and collecting all kinds of stuff! • Discover hidden secrets, solve challenging puzzles and complete hilarious quests! • Encounter new and fan favorite characters including Ice King, Gunter, Marceline, Lumpy Space Princess, Flambo, Magic Man, BMO and more!
